title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + PANEL: FRESH AND NEW ANGLES FOR TV PROJECTS (Sustained substantive investigations set you apart.)
description: Stuart Watson, an investigative reporter from WCN C-TVCharlotte, NC, shares insights on how to make good journalism and good business through rolling investigations and multipart series of reports. He emphasizes the importance of a substantive investigation, finding the right topic, selling the investigation to the newsroom, and human-interest stories.
